name: Demon Slayer / Kimetsu No Yaiba Anime Style LoRA
description:
Demon Slayer / Kimetsu No Yaiba anime style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Long time request, this is the style of the anime Demon Slayer, trained from screenshots of the first two seasons. Triggers with kimetsu no yaiba style at weight 1. Adding anime coloring helps too.

For the examples I used AnyLoRA which will give the most accurate result, but it might work on other anime models too, as long as they're not too much opinionated.

Be aware this is a style LoRA, so it requires character LoRA's or embeddings to be accurate (but it can do a fairly decent Tanjiro, as he was a big part of the dataset).

Enjoy.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
